column1: The '''Captains of the West''' were nobles of [[Gondor]] and other allied forces that participated to the latter stages of the [[War of the Ring]]
column2: namely leading the [[Army of the West]].

column4: [[Imrahil]] and other lords<ref>{{RK|V9}}</ref> perhaps including [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]]<ref>{{HM|Guide}}
column5: p. 62</ref> and they led the allied Army against the [[Morannon|gates]] of [[Mordor]] and the ensuing [[Battle of the Morannon]].<ref>{{RK|V10}}</ref>

column1: [[Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings]]
